name: John Smith
details: John Smith is a skilled software engineer with expertise in Java, Python, JavaScript, SQL, and HTML/CSS. He has developed numerous applications and possesses a deep understanding of software development principles and best practices. As a course author for Design Masterclass, she shares her knowledge and teaches aspiring designers.
